title: Health Works and Juice Bistro
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Juice bar, Take-out only, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Little health food store with a  lunch counter making food for takeaway. The menu is vegetarian and vegan friendly and includes juices, smoothies, sandwiches, wraps, salads, rice and beans, and soups. Known for their "veggie stack" sandwich. The owner, known as "The Colonel," had previously been schooled in ayurvedic and veterinary medicine in India and Denmark. Location is next door to Sprouts Market.
